caption.center: MARY ANN McMILLAN-HICKS, Respondent Below-Appellant, v. RICHARD HICKS,

opinion.posture: Court Below-Family Court of the State of Delaware, in and for New Castle County Petition No. 01-08413 File No. CN01-06211
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
Unpublished opinion is below.
MARY ANN McMILLAN-HICKS, Respondent Below-Appellant, v. RICHARD HICKS, Petitioner Below-Appellee. No. 252, 2002 In the Supreme Court of the State of Delaware. Submitted: November 8, 2002 Decided: December 19, 2002
Before VEASEY, Chief Justice, BERGER and STEELE, Justices
Myron T. Steele, Justice
ORDER This 19th day of December 2002, upon consideration of the briefs of the parties, it appears to the Court that the judgment of the Family Court should be affirmed on the basis of and for the reasons set forth in its decision dated April 24, 2002.
NOW, THEREFORE, IT IS ORDERED that the judgment of the Family Court is AFFIRMED.
